DOC.brief_summary: This human dietary intervention study randomize crossover design 4 treatment arm consist control , orange juice , whole orange , process whole orange investigate satiety effect treatments healthy volunteer . Self report hunger fullness score Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) form collect different time point prior post consumption treatment .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Whole Versus Processed Orange Consumption Satiety
DOC.detailed_description: This human dietary intervention study randomize crossover design 4 treatment arm consist control , orange juice , whole orange , process whole orange investigate satiety effect treatments healthy volunteer . Self report hunger fullness score Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) form collect different time point prior post consumption treatment .
DOC.criteria: Gender : male female ( postmenopausal woman ) Age start study : male ≥ 21and ≤ 65 year females ≥ 50 ≤ 65 year Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥ 18.5 ≤ 27 kg/m2 Apparently healthy : measure questionnaire , report current previous metabolic diseases chronic gastrointestinal disorder Reported dietary habit : medically prescribe diet , slimming diet , use eat 3 meal day Reported intense sporting activity ≤ 10h/w Reported alcohol consumption ≤21 units/w Informed consent sign Recruitment form fill Smoking Dislike , allergy intolerance test product Possible eating disorder ( measure SCOFF questionnaire score > 1 ) Eating habit questionnaire score > 14 Reported medical treatment may affect eat habits/satiety Pre menopausal woman
